com.fenglinga.tinyspring.framework.websocket

类 WebSocketUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fenglinga.tinyspring.framework.websocket.WebSocketUtils

  • public class WebSocketUtils
extends Object
    Static utility class containing methods used for websocket encoding and decoding.
    作者:
    DHRUV CHOPRA
